answers.answer: How are you? Do you drink more than 8 glasses of water everyday? Are there any other symptoms associated with your cloudy urine?Usually, healthy urine is light yellow. This is because adequate amount of fluids dilutes the urine and gives it a clear appearance. There are several things that can change the color of urine such as vegetables and fruits such as beets, blueberries and asparagus, vitamin B2, food coloring and prescription medications. Sometimes,  cloudy urine is a result of phosphaturia, a benign condition in which excess phosphate crystals form in urine that presents itself after eating, laborious exercise, and especially after severe mental labor. It also occurs largely with night or morning urination wherein no fluids were consumed so urine is more concentrated, which is perfectly natural and no cause for concern.I hope this helps. Take care and keep us posted.
